data.name: Yuma Will Burn
data.detailed_description:
Yuma Will Burn is a 2D platformer with unique survival mechanics. You play as Dante, a man who was once a doctor, but who has been banished to a cave underground due to an awful crime. Yuma Will Burn is a game that challenges traditional conceptions of what video games are creatively through an uncompromising artistic vision and a subversion of traditional game narrative.

HOW SURVIVAL MECHANICS WORK

The player has 3 stats to manage throughout the game.

HEALTH
Health is Dante’s physical well-being. The pit is desperate, and many won’t hesitate to kill Dante.

HUNGER
Hunger effects health. Food is scarce where light doesn’t reach, and Dante must fight to feed himself.

HOPE
Hope is Dante’s mental well-being. Protect it, or Dante can break down.

If health or hope reach 0, Dante dies. Upon death all save progress is deleted. This in combination with frequent moral choice moments, give Yuma an unique and powerful tension. Death is a constant threat, and you cannot be selfless without sacrifice. It is hard to be a good person.

data.short_description: Yuma Will Burn is a narrative indie game where you play as a doctor in desperate circumstances. Left to die in a cave, you must find ways to survive in an uncaring world. Harsh survival mechanics will lead you to earnestly experience triage, poverty, and fear.

content_descriptors.notes:
Warning-

This game contains depictions of the following. These topics are handled with the care and respect they're deserving of, but still might not be acceptable for all audiences.

-Language
-Violence
-Suicide
-Mental health 
-Implied sexual assault
